exmls.content:
<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="GameSceneSkin" width="640" height="1136" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ns1="*">
	<e:Image id="bg" source="game_bg_png" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0"/>
	<e:Group id="fallPacketGroup" height="1150" width="640"/>
	<e:Image id="timebg" source="game_timebg_png" y="89" x="205"/>
	<e:Image id="moneybg" source="game_moneybg_png" y="20" x="205"/>
	<e:Label id="packetLabel" text="999" y="23" width="150" height="50" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" textColor="0xFFFFFF" horizontalCenter="0" size="35"/>
	<e:Label id="timeLabel" y="92" text="999" width="150" height="50" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" textColor="0xFFFFFF" x="245" size="35"/>
	<e:Image id="item_box" source="game_item0_png" x="-151" y="127"/>
	<e:Image id="item_ipad" source="game_item1_png" x="466" y="372"/>
	<e:Image id="item_paper" source="game_item2_png" x="310" y="72"/>
	<e:Image id="hand" source="game_hand_png" x="35" y="620"/>
	<e:Image id="arrow" source="game_arrow_png" y="394" x="274"/>
	<e:Image id="staticPacket" source="game_packet_png" y="1145" x="121"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="OpenSceneSkin" width="640" height="1136" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="bg" source="open_bg_png" width="640" x="0" height="1136" y="0"/>
	<e:Image id="shareBtn" source="game_bag_png" x="558" y="-15"/>
	<e:Group id="openGroup" height="1136" width="640" x="0" y="0">
		<e:Rect id="openBtn" height="188" width="192" x="218" y="370"/>
		<e:Image id="openBg" source="open_open_png" y="228" x="47" touchEnabled="false"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="openedGroup" height="1136" width="640" x="0" y="0" visible="false">
		<e:Image id="openedBg" source="open_opened_png" x="48" y="168"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="PreloadSceneSkin" width="640" height="1136" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="bg" source="load_bg_png" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0"/>
	<e:Image id="anim1" source="load_anim1_png" x="211" y="266"/>
	<e:Image id="anim0" source="load_anim0_png" x="221" y="265"/>
	<e:Image id="barbg" source="load_barbg_png" y="460" x="91"/>
	<e:Image id="bar" source="load_bar_png" y="460" x="92" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0"/>
	<e:Image id="anim2" source="load_anim2_png" x="208" y="269"/>
	<e:Image id="anim3" source="load_anim3_png" x="208" y="267"/>
	<e:Label id="progressLabel" text="100%" y="497" textColor="0xEACB21" fontFamily="Arial" width="164" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" x="238"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="ResultUISkin" width="640" height="1136" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect height="1136" width="640" x="0" y="0" fillAlpha="0.7"/>
	<e:Rect id="openPacketBtn" height="150" width="150" x="247" y="402"/>
	<e:Rect id="prizeBtn" height="62" width="218" x="352" y="580"/>
	<e:Rect id="againBtn" height="66" width="212" x="78" y="579"/>
	<e:Image id="resultbg" source="game_resultbg_png" y="230" x="38" touchEnabled="false"/>
	<e:Image id="shareBtn" source="game_bag_png" x="559" y="-15" touchEnabled="true"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="ShareUISkin" width="640" height="1150" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect height="1136" width="640" x="0" y="0" fillAlpha="0.7"/>
	<e:Image id="haveChance" source="share0_png" x="127" y="18"/>
	<e:Image id="noChance" source="share1_png" x="126" y="17"/>
</e:Skin>
